overview_of_class: Two inter-related questions animate this introductory course: How does the choice of drama/theatre affect the ways in which a story is told? What are the fundamentals of Western drama?
name: Introduction to Drama
title: DOHA ENGLISH 212-0-70 Introduction to Drama
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Seats are reserved for Sophomore and Freshmen only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Two inter-related questions animate this introductory course: How does the choice of drama/theatre affect the ways in which a story is told? What are the fundamentals of Western drama?
